text:
Question 86) Upon hearing a flute and a piano issuing the same musical note, one can differentiate these instruments from each other.
This differentiation is mainly due to the
A) sound intensity of the sound of each musical instrument.
B) sound power of sound emitted by different musical instruments.
C) different propagation speed of sound emitted by each musical instrument.
D) sound of sound, which makes the wave formats of each instrument different.
E) sound height, which has different frequencies for different musical instruments.
